books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Partners in a small law firm take on a big case after a fast-track burnout joins them.
books.name: THE LITIGATORS

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A historic hotel in Boonsboro, Md., is getting a face-lift from the Montgomery brothers and their eccentric mother.
books.name: THE NEXT ALWAYS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A military investigator uncovers a conspiracy.
books.name: ZERO DAY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their Southern town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Former high school sweethearts fall tentatively back into each other’s orbits after more than a decade.
books.name: UNFINISHED BUSINESS

books.author: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: A widow keeps the identity of the new man she is about to marry a secret.
books.name: THE CHRISTMAS WEDDING

books.author: by Brandon Sanderson
books.description: In this follow-up to the Mistborn trilogy, a lawman adept at magic moves from the frontier to the even more dangerous city.
books.name: THE ALLOY OF LAW

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Surrounded by fascinating guests, a woman grows up in the luxury hotel her father founded.
books.name: HOTEL VENDOME

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: For Jack Reacher, an elite military police officer, it all started in 1997. A lonely railroad track. A crime scene. A cover-up.
books.name: THE AFFAIR

books.author: by Jeffrey Eugenides
books.description: Three Brown graduates in the early 1980s wrestle with love, religion and coming of age.
books.name: THE MARRIAGE PLOT

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Puppies that need good homes and an ex-husband loom large in the last installment of the Cedar Cove series.
books.name: 1225 CHRISTMAS TREE LANE

books.author: by Haruki Murakami
books.description: In 1980s Tokyo, a woman who punishes perpetrators of domestic violence has ties to an aspiring novelist who takes on an unusual ghostwriting project.
books.name: 1Q84
